document.title: Reference for `eif_type'
document.paragraph:
2SYNOPSYS
#include "eif_cecil. h" EIF_TYPE_ID eif_type (EIF_OBJECT object );
2DESCRIPTION The eif_type() function returns the type identifier corresponding to object.
2RETURN VALUE Type identifier of object. The behavior is unknown if object is not a valid Eiffel object.
2CONFORMANCE ISE Eiffel 4. 3 and later.
2COMPATIBILITY
eif_type() is equivalent to eif_type_by_reference(eif_access (object)).
2SEE ALSO
eif_type_by_reference(1) , eif_type_id(1). Markup created by 1. 0, November 15, 1999.
